attributes.action: Bring back GCSE English Speaking&Listening Grade!
attributes.additional_details: This petition has the aim of changing Michael Gove's decision to take away 20% of the GCSE English Speaking&Listening assessment and replace it with another 20% of English Language examination. Before this decision was made, the English Language GCSE consisted of 60% Controlled Assessment and 40% examination, now it consists of only 40% Controlled Assessment and alternatively, 60% Examination. Please sign this petition today.
